title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements from stakeholders, define the project scope, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Design AR Learning Platform Architecture - REVISED
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture for the Augmented Reality Education project. This includes the AR rendering engine, content management system, user interface, and data storage. The design aims to optimize scalability, performance, security, maintainability, accessibility, and usability. Detailed specifications of components, their responsibilities, and interactions are provided. Integration with existing educational platforms is considered, ensuring compatibility with assistive technologies for diverse learners. A modular structure is adopted to facilitate future updates and improvements. Mockups or diagrams are included where appropriate. Required APIs and documentation for developers are defined. User roles and permissions, data privacy considerations, error handling mechanisms, and performance optimization strategies are detailed. In case of any dependencies on other tasks or RFCs, they are listed explicitly. A timeline for task completion is suggested. Please review the document thoroughly, and suggest any necessary changes or improvements.

title: Develop AR Rendering Engine
description: Implement the AR rendering engine responsible for displaying interactive 3D content and overlaying it on the real-world environment.

title: Build Content Management System
description: Develop a system for creating, managing, and distributing AR learning content, including 3D models, animations, and interactive simulations.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (Revised)
description: Create an intuitive, engaging, visually appealing, accessible, and easy-to-navigate user interface for students and educators. The UI should be optimized for different device types (smartphones, tablets, AR headsets) and incorporate gamification elements to enhance the learning experience. To achieve this, collaboration between UX/UI designers, frontend developers, accessibility experts, game designers, educational consultants, and cognitive psychologists (for learning effectiveness) is recommended. Ensure accessibility features are implemented to cater to users with disabilities. Once the design phase is complete, conduct usability testing, iterate as necessary, and make any adjustments suggested by testers. This task depends on 'Design AR Learning Platform Architecture' and should be prioritized appropriately. Upon completion of this RFC, assign to the task-decomposer for further decomposition into tasks.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, user authentication, and access control.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the AR learning platform.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Plan and execute user acceptance testing with educators and students to validate the platform's functionality and usability.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for educators, students, and administrators.

title: Deploy and Launch AR Learning Platform
description: Deploy the AR learning platform to production environments and coordinate the official launch.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
